verses.t: For{G1063} as touching{G4012} the ministering{G3588} to{G1519} the saints{G40}, it is{G2076} superfluous{G4053} for me{G3427} to write{G1125} to you{G5213}:

For{G1063} I know{G1492} the forwardness{G3588} of your mind{G5216}, for which{G3739} I boast{G2744} of{G5228} you{G5216} to them of Macedonia{G3110}, that{G3754} Achaia{G882} was ready{G3903} a year ago{G4070}; and{G2532} your{G5216} zeal{G2205} hath provoked{G2042} very many{G4119}.

Yet{G1161} have I sent{G3992} the brethren{G3588}, lest{G2443} our{G2257} boasting{G3588} of{G5228} you{G5216} should be in vain{G2758} in{G1722} this{G5129} behalf{G3588}; that{G2443}, as{G2531} I said{G3004}, ye may{G3903} be{G5600} ready{G3903}:

Lest haply{G3381} if{G1437} they of Macedonia{G3110} come{G2064} with{G4862} me{G1698}, and{G2532} find{G2147} you{G5209} unprepared{G532}, we{G2249} (that{G2443} we say{G3004} not{G3361}, ye{G5210}) should be ashamed{G2617} in{G1722} this same{G3778} confident{G3588} boasting{G3588}.

Therefore{G3767} I thought it{G2233} necessary{G316} to exhort{G3870} the brethren{G3588}, that{G2443} they would go before{G4281} unto{G1519} you{G5209}, and{G2532} make up beforehand{G4294} your{G5216} bounty{G2129}, whereof ye had notice before{G4293}, that the same{G3778} might be{G1511} ready{G2092}, as{G5613} a matter of bounty{G2129}, and{G2532} not{G3361} as{G5618} of covetousness{G4124}.

But{G1161} this{G5124} I say, He{G3588} which soweth{G4687} sparingly{G5340} shall reap{G2325} also{G2532} sparingly{G5340}; and{G2532} he{G3588} which soweth{G4687} bountifully{G2129} shall reap{G2325} also{G2532} bountifully{G2129}.

Every man{G1538} according as{G2531} he purposeth{G4255} in his heart{G3588}, so let him give; not{G3361} grudgingly{G3077}, or{G2228} of{G1537} necessity{G318}: for{G1063} God{G3588} loveth{G25} a cheerful{G2431} giver{G1395}.

And{G1161} God{G3588} is able{G1415} to make all{G3956} grace{G5485} abound{G4052} toward{G1519} you{G5209}; that{G2443} ye, always{G3842} having{G2192} all{G3956} sufficiency{G841} in{G1722} all{G3956} things, may abound{G4052} to{G1519} every{G3956} good{G18} work{G2041}:
(As{G2531} it is written{G1125}, He hath dispersed abroad{G4650}; he hath given{G1325} to the poor{G3588}: his{G846} righteousness{G3588} remaineth{G3306} for{G1519} ever{G3588}.

Now{G1161} he that{G3588} ministereth{G2023} seed{G4690} to the sower{G4687} both{G2532} minister{G5524} bread{G740} for{G1519} your food{G1035}, and{G2532} multiply{G4129} your{G5216} seed sown{G3588}, and{G2532} increase{G837} the fruits{G3588} of your{G5216} righteousness{G3588};)
Being enriched{G4148} in{G1722}every thing{G3956} to{G1519} all{G3956} bountifulness{G572}, which{G3748} causeth{G2716} through{G1223} us{G2257} thanksgiving{G2169} to God{G3588}.

For{G3754} the administration{G3588} of this{G3778} service{G3588} not{G3756} only{G3440} supplieth{G4322} the want{G3588} of the saints{G40}, but{G235} is{G2076} abundant{G4052} also{G2532} by{G1223} many{G4183} thanksgivings{G2169} unto God{G3588};

Whiles{G1223} by the experiment{G3588} of this{G3778} ministration{G3588} they glorify{G1392} God{G3588} for{G1909} your{G5216} professed{G3588} subjection{G3588} unto{G1519} the gospel{G3588} of Christ{G3588}, and{G2532} for your liberal{G572} distribution{G3588} unto{G1519} them{G846}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} all{G3956} men;
And{G2532} by their{G846} prayer{G1162} for{G5228} you{G5216}, which long after{G1971} you{G5209} for{G1223} the exceeding{G5235} grace{G5485} of God{G3588} in{G1909} you{G5213}.
Thanks{G5485} be unto{G1909} God{G3588} for{G1161} his{G846} unspeakable{G411} gift{G1431}.
